item.title: Vema predicts cheap hydrogen could change where data centers are built
item.description: Vema Hydrogen drills wells to stimulate hydrogen production deep underground, which could result in some of the cheapest hydrogen available.

item.title: Avalanche thinks the fusion power industry should think smaller
item.description: Avalanche has raised $29 million in fresh funding to pursue its unique approach to fusion power, which can currently fit on a table.

item.title: Fintech CEO and Forbes 30 Under 30 alum has been charged for alleged fraud
item.description: The startup CEO says she plans to publicly address the charges this week.

item.title: Waymo raises $16B to scale robotaxi fleet internationally
item.description: Waymo said the funds will be used to fuel its growth, which has accelerated over the past year and doesn't appear to be slowing.

item.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX officially acquires Elon Musk’s xAI, with plan to build data centers in space
item.description: The merger creates the world's most valuable private company and paves the way for Musk to try and prove out the usefulness of space-based data center...
